props.baseColor: Sets the color of the input when it is not focused
props.error: Puts the input in a manual error state
props.centerAffix: Vertically align **appendInner**, **prependInner**, **clearIcon** and **label** in the center
props.clearIcon: The icon used when the **clerable** prop is set to true
props.disabled: Removes the ability to click or target the input
props.persistentClear: Always show the clearable icon when the input is dirty (By default it only shows on hover)
props.singleLine: Label does not move on focus/dirty
props.id: Sets the DOM id on the component
props.prependInnerIcon: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **prepend-inner** slot
props.appendInnerIcon: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **append-inner** slot
props.dirty: Manually apply the dirty state styling

events.click:append: Emitted when append icon is clicked
events.click:appendInner: Emitted when appended inner icon is clicked
events.click:control: Emitted when the main input is clicked
events.click:prepend: Emitted when prepended icon is clicked
events.click:prependInner: Emitted when prepended inner icon is clicked
events.group:selected: Event that is emitted when an item is selected within a group.
events.update:focused: Emitted when the input is focused or blurred

slots.append-inner: Slot that is appended to the input
slots.clear: Slot for custom clear icon (displayed when the **clearable** prop is equal to true)
slots.label: The default slot of the [v-label](/api/v-label/) or [v-field-label](/api/v-field-label/) component
slots.prepend-inner: Slot that is prepended to the input

exposed.controlRef: Reference to the control element of the field
